One, Two, and Three Bedroom Silverdale WA Luxury Apartments Your dream apartment awaits at the newly renovated Trillium Heights Apartments in Silverdale, WA.
We offer spacious one, two, and three bedroom floor plan options.
With several floor plans available we will be sure to have to right apartment to fit your lifestyle.
Call us today to visit our Silverdale apartment complex!
New Luxury Amenities Our luxury Silverdale apartment complex offers a wide arrange of new amenities.
With our latest renovations you will be sure to be impressed with all the luxuries included with your rental.

A few of our community amenities include:    State-of-the-art Fitness Center  Billiards and Game Room Clubhouse  Heated Indoor Pool & Spa  Fireside Lounge  To find out even more about community and apartment offerings at Trillium Heights, view a full list of our amenities!
Silverdale Rentals with a Convenient Location You will fall in love with Trillium Heights ideal location in Silverdale, Washington.
We are located directly off Highway 3 making us minutes from shopping, dining, parks, and more.
Spend your morning catching the latest movie at the local theater, then grab some food at the nearby grocer to bring to one of the many parks within the area.
When you rent with Trillium Heights Apartments, you will experience convenience at its finest.
Check out our location and discover more about the neighborhood!
Find the Perfect Apartments in Silverdale Your apartment dreams can become a reality when you lease Trillium Heights Apartments.
Our Silverdale apartments make the perfect place to call home with our outstanding services and luxurious amenities.
